pr_title: Site: Add Tencent and TBDS logo in powered-by image

timeline.bodyText: The paragraph is too long. We'd better simplify it and focus on technique part.
timeline.author: DonnyZone
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -137,3 +137,7 @@ It uses Calcite to transparently rewrite queries to use materialized views. is a SQL interface to a Apache TinkerPop-enabled graph database. + +### TBDS + +[TBDS](https://cloud.tencent.com/product/tbds) (Tencent Big Data Suite) is a reliable, safe, and easy-to-use big data processing platform based on Tencent's years of massive data processing experience. With the help of TBDS, you can choose a suitable big data analysis engine and corresponding real-time data development, offline data development, and algorithm development services to build your data warehouse in public, private, and non-cloud environments. Big data application services such as user portraits, precise recommendations, and risk management.

timeline.bodyText: How about ".... is a platform for big data storage and processing. It uses calcite for query analysis."?
timeline.author: DonnyZone
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -137,3 +137,7 @@ It uses Calcite to transparently rewrite queries to use materialized views. is a SQL interface to a Apache TinkerPop-enabled graph database. + +### TBDS + +[TBDS](https://cloud.tencent.com/product/tbds) (Tencent Big Data Suite) is Big data computing and analysis platform, it uses calcite for query analysis.

replies.bodyText:
How about ".... is a platform for big data storage and processing. It uses calcite for query analysis."?

well ,Let me change it.
replies.author: XuQianJin-Stars

replies.bodyText: What does query analysis mean? Parser? or optimizer?
replies.author: hsyuan

replies.bodyText:
What does query analysis mean? Parser? or optimizer?
